data.title: Discovery Art | May 1, 2024 at 7:00 PM
data.meta_description: Dive into an array of artistic expressions at this auction, featuring a diverse selection from notable artists. Benjamin (B Davis) Davis's oil painting captures a serene landscape with a cottage by the water, Ronald Abram's autumnal woodland scene exudes warmth and nostalgia, Marlene E. Miller's vibrant oil on canvas depicts a lively parade of dancers. Richard Rogers's versatile portfolio spans delicate watercolors of sunflowers to bold abstract compositions, showcasing his mastery across genres. Karl Philip Huf's intimate depiction of a general store facade offers a glimpse into a bygone era, while Della J. Barber's architectural landscapes transport viewers to picturesque locales. Elnora "Nora" Hauser's expressive seascapes and abstract compositions captivate with their emotive qualities. From tranquil landscapes to dynamic urban scenes, this auction presents a tapestry of artistic visions waiting to be explored and admired.
data.text:
Bid now through Wednesday, May 1st. This auction will begin closing at 7:00 PM at a rate of 5 lots per minute.

Buyerâ€™s Premium: 23%

In-Person Preview by appointment only:

Monday April 29th , 9:00 AM - 3:00 PM

Tuesday April 30th, 9:00 AM - 3:00 PM

Schedule a Preview via preview@alderferauction.com

When scheduling you must provide your 1) email address and 2) up to 10 lot numbers you are interested in previewing.

Condition Report Requests | alderferauction.com/condition-report

Pick-Up: Successful Bidders will be notified to schedule a pick-up following the auction.

Pick-Up Location: Alderfer Auction at 501 Fairgrounds Road, Hatfield, PA 19440

Shipping: In-house shipping is available for smaller non-fragile items via USPS priority boxes. For all medium to large, fragile, and international items, please contact a local shipper. Contact shipping@alderferauction.com for questions.

Please check our website frequently for updates.

NOTE: We reserve the right to adjust auction information and dates.

Embark on a journey through artistic expression with the eclectic offerings at this auction, showcasing the diverse talents of renowned artists. Benjamin (B Davis) Davis's oil painting invites viewers into a tranquil world. Ronald Abram's contribution to the collection transports viewers to the vibrant hues of autumn, the golden foliage and rustic charm of Abram's painting evoke a sense of nostalgia, capturing the essence of the season with warmth and beauty.

Marlene E. Miller's oil on canvas bursts with energy and movement, depicting a lively parade of dancers weaving through an urban landscape. Miller's vibrant colors and dynamic compositions infuse the scene with a sense of joy and celebration, inviting viewers to join in the festivities.

Richard Rogers's versatile portfolio spans a wide range of styles and subjects, from delicate watercolors of sunflowers to bold abstract compositions. Rogers's mastery of the medium is evident in each piece, as he effortlessly navigates between realism and abstraction, capturing the essence of his subjects with precision and grace.

Karl Philip Huf's intimate portrayal of a general store facade offers a glimpse into a bygone era, while Della J. Barber's architectural landscapes transport viewers to picturesque locales filled with charm and character. Elnora "Nora" Hauser's expressive seascapes and abstract compositions captivate with their emotive qualities, inviting viewers to explore the depths of her imagination.

From tranquil landscapes to dynamic urban scenes, this auction presents a tapestry of artistic visions waiting to be explored and admired. With each piece offering a unique perspective and narrative, collectors and enthusiasts alike are sure to find inspiration in the rich diversity of works on display.
